thread.title: KITH and Aimé Leon Dore Look to Greece For New “Mykonos” Collection
thread.title_full: KITH and Aimé Leon Dore Look to Greece For New “Mykonos” Collection

author: Jonathan Sawyer
title: KITH and Aimé Leon Dore Look to Greece For New “Mykonos” Collection
text:
Visit the original post to see all 10 images from this gallery. 
Brand: KITH, Aimé Leon Dore
Season: SS17
Key Pieces: Nammos Pullover Sailing Jacket, Knox Pant, Anchor Logo Cap.
Editor’s Notes: For KITH and Aimé Leon Dore’s latest project, the two outlets draw inspiration from Mykonos, Greece, more specifically, a trip to the island by Ronnie Fieg and Teddy Santis. The collection thus channels their experience, utilizing colors and iconography influenced by the island’s culture.
You can look forward to the nautical-themed “Mykonos” collection from KITH and Aimé Leon Dore releasing this Friday at KITH shops and KITH.com .
Just last week KITH came together with OFF-WHITE for the “OFF-PALETTE” capsule.
